title: lost folders and files
content: I returned from holiday to find a new version of Thunderbird running on my PC. All the old email folders going back to 2017 and all my emails prior to 14 Aug. 2024 were gone! I don't have a back up of my hard drive. Is there any way to retrieve the folders and emails? Cheers Chris
creator: christopher.wood11

title: Cannot reveive nor send email
content: For the past two days (Aug 20,2024) I have received NO emails and CANNOT send. I get the message, "because the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.gmail.com timed out." I have tried reloading Thunderbird with no results. The email zfhanna@gmail is also on my phone. My Tbird is on an IMac and Windows 10 laptop. Neither works. For Wifi I use a satellite provider.
creator: zfhanna

title: How to archive a Local folder and subfolders?
content: I have moved from Mailbird to Thunderbird, a pat on my back I am really satisfied. I use POP3 so all my emails are downloaded to my computer. I keep two years of incoming and sent emails in Local Folders as follows: email account 1 year 2023 > Folders and subfolders organized per topic year 2022 > Folders and subfolders organized per topic The same for three other accounts. These occupy a lot of disk space, so I want to archive each email account with its folders and subfolders and move them to an external drive. Is this possible with Thunderbird? Please help enodio enobri17@gmail.com
creator: enodio

title: Sincronizzazione server/Thunderbird
content: Salve, ho installato Thunderbird 128.1.1esr (64 bit). Ho impostato l'account di posta elettronica con IMAP e scaricato tutti i messaggi presenti nel server. Ho impostato la sincronizzazione in modo da lasciare una copia dei messaggi sul server quando li scarico su Thinderbird. Ora però, ho bisogno che la sincronizzazione mi consenta di lasciare i messaggi su Thunderbird quando li cancello dal server (ci sono molti messaggi vecchi che voglio conservare nel mio hard disc, ma che mi occupano troppo spazio nel server), mentre, invece va bene che vengano cancellati anche nel server se li cancello da Thunderbird. Come posso fare?
creator: leogioffre

title: New York Times
content: This site has been very helpful to me. I thank you and I have a new question now that my e-mail is operational. I am a New York Times digital subscriber. As such I am allowed to gift a certain number of articles each month. Today when I tried to do that I was given a choice of paths for sending articles, Gmail and a few more with an option for other. But I don't know what to tell the New York Times as to how I want to be hooked to Thunderbird as the vehicle for gifting my allotted articles to others. Can someone help? Thank you, Doug
creator: kamholzmarvels

title: attaching a previous email to a reply to an email
content:
1) I get an email from (email@x) asking me to send information to (email address) 2) So I send an email to (email@x). I save this in Thunderbird 3) I then get a new message from (email@x) which asks me again to send the information in my previous email. This means they probably didn't receive the email sent in 2) or they didn't read it. 4) I click on reply to their message received in 3). I then want to attach the email which I sent previously in 2).

I cannot click on attach and select the email sent in 2) (which is saved in Thunderbird). I can of course click on the email sent in 2) and forward as an attachment, but I want it to be an attachment to the reply in 4) not a new email.

How should I proceed?
creator: old_nic

title: Viestien sisältö hukassa
content: Hei, n. 2 viikkoa vanhoista ja sitä vanhemmista viesteistä on sisältö hävinnyt. 2022 vuoden saapuneet viestit avautuvat taas normaalisti. Mikähän on vialla?

title: Email redirect or
content: I have changed email address and would like to have an auto reply sent to the sender to alert them to the fact that the email address has changed. I will still need to receive the intended email, but just a return email saying please be advised that our email address has changed to xxx@xxx.com, just for a month or so. Any help will be appreciated.

title: Icloud account toevoegen bij Thunderbird
content: Op welke manier kan ik mijn icloud-account toevoegen bij Thunderbird. Met de installatie van TBsync en Caldav ben ik daar een paar maand geleden in geslaagd. Nu werkt dit niet meer. Ik heb het icloud account verwijderd en slaag er niet meer in om het opnieuw toe te voegen. Jammer want ik werk eigenlijk zeer graag met de agenda van Thunderbird, en ook de andere componenten van Thunderbird vind ik zeer OK.

title: Estensione della memoria nella nostra mail
content: Salve abbiamo la mail al 95% della capienza e vorremmo sapere come aumentarla o come acquistare dello spazio in piu grazie
creator: isacostanzi

title: Thunderbird on Linux forwarding to alias on localhost ignores nsswitch.conf settings
content:
Thunderbird 115.13.0 (64-bit) on Linux using filters to forward to an alias on localhost ignores the nsswitch.conf settings and attempts to send the email to the main configured SMTP server instead of via the localhost SMTP server for the email address being forwarded to, which is process@localhost.

This process alias is defined in the /etc/aliases file and my nsswitch.conf file has file dns as the hosts: values.

The alias being sent to is supposed to process the email being forwarded and write the result to a file.
creator: GarfsField

title: e mail hacked yesterday
content:
told by several people they had had suspicious messages purporting to come from me. Contacted Virgin Media, eventually got a new password, and was assured I would now get e mails as normal. This did not happen. Tried again, got a password for external apps, but still no success. No e mails are appearing even on the Virgin Media site. Any suggestions most welcome.

regards, Gilbert
creator: gilbertbarnatt522

title: allegato pdf non visibile
content: Buongiorno, utilizzo thunderbird 128.1.1esr (64 bit) su windows 11. Ho sempre ricevuto mail (@gmail.com) con svariati allegati e nessun problema. Mi e' arrivata la mail di ricevuta del passaporto elettronico ma senza l'allegato .pdf (Dichiarazione.pdf) che contiene il documento di da compilare per la richiesta. premetto che sia da smartphone e da account google sul pc l'allegato e' presente e stampabile. Non compare solo in thunderbird. Come mai ? Ringrazio chiunque mi aiuti
creator: nicdaddy

title: Localhost connection
content:
All my email accounts worked until 9.30 pm 8/22/24

When I went on the computer on this morning, 8/23/24 I got the following message:

Unable to connect

An error occurred during a connection to localhost. 

   The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments.    If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer’s network connection.    If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure that Thunderbird is permitted to access the web.

I cannot send or receive email from Thunderbird. I turned off and on the computer, I'm set at imap, port 993 and OAuth2. I don't know what else to do. FireFox works fine.

Thanks for any help. (please reply to akapugs@ yahoo.com. That email is working, as it is not connected to Thunderbird)

Leslie
creator: Puglady

title: Con il novo aggiornamento non vedo più le cartelle locali
content: Da stamattina, nella barra di sinistra, non trovo più le CARTELLE LOCALI. Se vado nelle impostazioni, sono correttamente selezionate, ma non riesco più a vederle
creator: dir.lullibrico

title: The content of messages in the inbox or in the sent folder disappears.
content: The operating system: Windows 10. The content of messages in the inbox or in the sent folder disappears. Emails from a continuous period are disappearing, for example, now they have disappeared from 12th July at 9:45 to 22nd August at 12:13. The messages are visible on the list, but they have no content. They had content before. Moreover, when I deleted all the emails from such a folder, its file size on the disk did not decrease to 0. The problem started to appear the day before yesterday. It had never happened before. How can I fix this problem?
creator: milosz.gorecki
